name: monday-quick-peek
description: Instant hover preview for Monday.com notes and comments

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run validate
scripts.build:package: npm run build && npm run package
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -r manifest.json popup.html scripts styles icons dist/
scripts.package: cd dist && zip -r ../monday-quick-peek.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' && cd .. && echo '‚úÖ Package created: monday-quick-peek.zip'
scripts.package:win: cd dist && powershell Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath ../monday-quick-peek.zip && cd .. && echo '‚úÖ Package created: monday-quick-peek.zip'
